languages.text: "Я не распоряжаюсь собой, Вольный Торговец. Однако, если миссия будет выполнена, маршал вряд ли откажет отрядить меня в ваше сопровождение".
"I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."
languages.original_text: "Я не распоряжаюсь собой, Вольный Торговец. Однако, если миссия будет выполнена, маршал вряд ли откажет отрядить меня в ваше сопровождение".

traits.locale_text: "I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."
"I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."
"I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."
"I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."
"I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."

languages.text: «No tengo autoridad para elegir mis misiones, Comerciante. No obstante, si tenemos éxito, es poco probable que el Mariscal se oponga a que me una a su escolta».
languages.original_text: "I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo autoridad para elegir mis misiones, Comerciante. No obstante, si tenemos éxito, es poco probable que el Mariscal se oponga a que me una a su escolta».

languages.text: “我无权选择我的职责，行商浪人。不过，如果这次行动顺利的话，元帅多半会同意委派我跟在你身边，保护你的人身安全。”
languages.original_text: "I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."

traits.locale_text: “我无权选择我的职责，行商浪人。不过，如果这次行动顺利的话，元帅多半会同意委派我跟在你身边，保护你的人身安全。”

languages.text: « Je ne suis pas habilité à choisir moi-même mes affectations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Cependant, si la mission aboutit, le maréchal ne refusera sûrement pas de me détacher auprès de votre escorte. »
languages.original_text: "I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne suis pas habilité à choisir moi-même mes affectations, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Cependant, si la mission aboutit, le maréchal ne refusera sûrement pas de me détacher auprès de votre escorte. »

languages.text: 「私には私の割当てを選択する権限がありません、ローグトレーダー。しかし、ミッションが成功すれば、将帥はあなたのエスコートとして私を配置することを拒むことはないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."

traits.locale_text: 「私には私の割当てを選択する権限がありません、ローグトレーダー。しかし、ミッションが成功すれば、将帥はあなたのエスコートとして私を配置することを拒むことはないでしょう」

languages.text: "Görevlerimi seçme yetkisine sahip değilim Hür Tacir. Ancak görev başarıyla tamamlanırsa Miralay'ın beni refakatçiniz olarak görevlendirmeyi reddedeceğini sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."

traits.locale_text: "Görevlerimi seçme yetkisine sahip değilim Hür Tacir. Ancak görev başarıyla tamamlanırsa Miralay'ın beni refakatçiniz olarak görevlendirmeyi reddedeceğini sanmıyorum."

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht autorisiert, das zu entscheiden, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Sollte die Mission von Erfolg gekrönt sein, wird sich der Marschall aber wohl nicht weigern, mich als Eure Eskorte abzustellen."
languages.original_text: "I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nicht autorisiert, das zu entscheiden, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Sollte die Mission von Erfolg gekrönt sein, wird sich der Marschall aber wohl nicht weigern, mich als Eure Eskorte abzustellen."

languages.original_text: "I do not have the power to choose my assignments, Rogue Trader. However, if the mission is successful, the Marshal is unlikely to refuse to deploy me as your escort."
